div.p: Clinical Care Classification System (formerly Home Health Care Classification system) codes. The Clinical Care Classification (CCC) consists of two taxonomies: CCC of Nursing Diagnoses and CCC of Nursing Interventions both of which are classified by 21 Care Components. Each of these are classified by Care Components which provide a standardized framework for documenting patient care in hospitals, home health agencies, ambulatory care clinics, and other health care settings.
